Every Thursday | 6:30pm Check-In | 7:00pm Start
19 NW 5th Ave Downtown Portland OR

This Coming Thursday's Tournament

Signing up is a bracket spot reservation request. Bracket is not final until player FargoRate verification/assignment and payment are completed in-person with the Tournament Director at Check-In.
If the bracket is full, sign up to automatically be added to the Waitlist or Text Brittany Posey (the Tournament Director) to see if a spot is open.
Unconfirmed: Awaiting FargoRate check by the Tournament Director (TD)   |   RSVP: You've been invited, message TD to confirm   |   Confirmed: Your spot is secured!   |   Waiting_List: Bracket is Full, TD will contact you if a spot opens up   |   Entry_Paid: Checked in, Paid, Ready to Play!

*Actual pot size and payouts are contingent on player attendance and discretionary House donation.
